resources.string: RingyDingyDingy needs device administration privileges to enable remote locking. Please accept this if you want to lock your phone remotely.
Sorry, but I can\'t do a remote lock. Locking needs Froyo or newer.
Sorry, but I can\'t do a remote lock. I haven\'t been given permission to.

Welcome to RingyDingyDingy!

To perform a remote ring, text "RingyDingyDingy <code>" or "RingyDingyDingy <code> ring" to this phone.<remote_lock_information>

To change your activation code<remote_lock_settings>, press Menu and tap Settings.
Remote locking requires Android 2.2 (Froyo) or newer
Tap to generate a new random code

Please enter your new activation code. It must be between four and eight characters long and cannot contain spaces. Please note that anyone with access to your phone can view your code at any time, so don\'t use anything secret like a PIN code!
Sorry, your code wasn\'t valid. It must be between four and eight characters long and cannot contain spaces.
Tap to type in your own activation code
\nTo perform a remote lock, text \"RingyDingyDingy <code> lock\" to this phone.
Remote ring has been initiated by
Unknown command. Please text \"RingyDingyDingy <code> help\" for a list of commands.
Text \"RingyDingyDingy <code> <cmd>\". Replace <code> with your activation code. <cmd> is one of: help, lock, ring.
